price: Yeroo gabrichi Rabbii (Muhammad SAW!) Isa waammachuuf dhaabbatu (jinnoonni) isa irratti tuuta ta'utti dhihaatu.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدۡعُوهُ كَادُواْ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِ لِبَدٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu lammā qāma ʿabdu al-lahi yadʿūhu kādū yakūnūna ʿalayhi libadan
